title: Gold 2 is a divine punishment upon me
body:
I know that as president i should remain balanced... but, i can't....  7 promotions in this cursed division, and still stucked here, like wtf? last game i had a Teemo troll who said he wanted to go adc, then he goes top in a bush and remain invisible there all the game.... Is this some kind of of divine punishment? What did i do to earn this treatment...

Please GD, fellow GDers, tell me the trick to trick the gods and go up to gold 1
